CustomField.description: Patient status codes for Status = Active
CustomField.formula: CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Status__c, "Active", CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Sub_Status__c, "Treatment Confirmed","A02", "Patient Support","A03", "Prescriber Support","A05", "Transfer to SP IAP","A09", "Transfer to SP PAP","A10", "Prior Authorization Support Start","A11", "Prior Authorization Approved","A12", "Prior Authorization Denied","A13", "Appeal Support (1st Level)","A14", "Appeal Support (2nd Level)","A15", "Appeal Support (3rd Level)","A16", "Appeal Support (Peer-to-Peer)","A17", "Appeal Approved","A18", "Appeal Denied","A19", "PA/Appeal Support Max Attempts","A20", "Claims Support","A21", "Copay Support","A22", null), null)
CustomField.label: Status Code - Active
